DOC.brief_summary: Is the surgical treatment of patients with coronary heart disease using the T-graft technique an adequate solution that provides a sufficient myocardial flow reserve? A magnetic resonance examination (MRI) is required.
DOC.brief_title: Coronary Flow Rate Measurement in T-Grafts
DOC.criteria: coronary heart disease Age > 18 ys Ejection fraction > 45% myocardial infarction ReIntervention
